medical_history.chief_complaint: Jaundice and increasing upper abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one week prior to presentation, with worsening jaundice and upper abdominal pain. The patient also exhibited icterus and stigmata of Cowden syndrome.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history includes macrocephaly, multiple intestinal polyps, skin hamartomas, lipomas, and thyroidectomy for papillary thyroid cancer at age 38 years.
medical_history.family_history: Rich family history suggestive of Cowden syndrome.
